attributes.additional_details: As of typing fire fighter are tackling fires thought to be caused by discarded disposable BBQs.
attributes.background:
Every summer our over stretched fire services have to attend fires caused by irresponsible people using disposable BBQs.
It really is time they were banned before any more damage is done to our parks, woodland and moors.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315762
